Params[3]: It's been so long since the last record.
Everybody has stopped going to class. Mommy and Daddy are also staying at home.
It's got something to do with a strange virus.
It's a virus that infects people... and also electronics.
The infected people all die very quickly... and the infected electronics all... begin attacking humans, it's very strange.
Oh, right. The system matched Nanami with someone... That someone's a girl.
Through projection chatting, we talked a lot about... stuff. She likes a lot of things similar to Nanami, that's the good ol' Gestalt at work.
She doesn't have black hair, but she has blue eyes. Just like Mommy.
It's sad that the Gestalt system's matching function is going to be shut down... all because of the virus... But at least, Jane and I exchanged contacts!
Jane said she would come meet me after some time, and we can finally see each other.
When the time comes... What should Nanami wear...? Hmmm, it's a brain teaser.
